channel.title: healthTest
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from healthTest, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: New Type of Glucose Sensor to Enter US Market
item.description: The Biolinq Shine wearable displays color-coded glucose values and adds other metrics via an app. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Rapid diagnostic test can detect asymptomatic malaria cases
item.description: Researchers have adapted a rapid diagnostic technology that is able to identify undetected cases of malaria, helping tackle the spread of disease.

item.description: A new poll shows trust in federal health policies is plummeting, and what — or who — people believe increasingly depends on their politics.
